item.title: Government shutdown updates: GOP decries Dems' shutdown offer, weekend votes unclear
item.description: The Senate will be in session on Saturday, starting at noon but it's not clear what, if anything, senators will vote on.

item.title: WATCH: US consumer sentiment nears record lows amid government shutdown
item.description: ABC News' Elizabeth Schulze reports on weak financial data raising fresh concerns about the economy.
